author: Special Correspondent
text:
The residents of Pudukudi , Devamangalam, and neighbouring villages near Jayamkondam staged a demonstration on Tuesday for the third consecutive day protesting against the reported move of Oil and Natural Gas Commission (ONGC) to conduct a survey in their villages.

They said the move would ultimately lead to gas extraction. It would pose livelihood issues to local people. Hence, the State and Union governments should take steps to impress upon ONGC to abandon the survey, they demanded.
title: Villagers stage demonstration
